summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5952 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue West from Government Way to West Barrett Seattle, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving with portland cement concrete and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79282 as amended by Ordinance No. 79339, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
